entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:07 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:07 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 8:07 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
